heading: HB04440
0: AN ACT INCREASING THE AUTHORIZED BED CAPACITY OF THE TOMAS LACHICA DISTRICT HOSPITAL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF JOSE ABAD SANTOS, PROVINCE OF DAVAO OCCIDENTAL FROM TWENTY-FIVE (25) BEDS TO FIFTY (5) BEDS, UPGRADING THE MEDICAL FACILITIES, IMPROVING HEALTH-CARE SERVICES THEREIN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2016-11-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04440
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE AUTHORIZED BED CAPACITY OF THE TOMAS LACHICA DISTRICT HOSPITAL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF JOSE ABAD SANTOS, PROVINCE OF DAVAO OCCIDENTAL FROM TWENTY-FIVE (25) BEDS TO FIFTY (5) BEDS, UPGRADING THE MEDICAL FACILITIES, IMPROVING HEALTH-CARE SERVICES THEREIN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
